responses.gpt4: Good morning! My name is Rachel from O'Connor Hospital. I'm calling in regard to your upcoming colonoscopy procedure scheduled for August 17 at 11:00 AM. May I ask whether this is a convenient time for us to discuss this? By the way, how has your day been so far?
